events.text:
I can cook, but unfortunately I can't hunt nor fish.
The expeditionary effort took all of our fisherman and hunters with them leaving me behind with no one to help me.
I need someone to bring me ingredients so I can cook for this ungrateful town!
My stockpile of Bluescale salmon is running dangerously low and those damn fin lookin' people southeast of here are hoarding all the damn fish!
I need you to go over there and bring 10 Bluescale salmons from either their fishy hands or fishy stockpiles, and I just might be able to cook you some too!

Ya got me the fish and this will be consumed in no time! Now, to show you what you've been missing out on! <Turns around and simmers you up a fish with the upmost care>
Here! Now go! I got work to do!
